name: Icon
description: The main Icon component is basically a wrapper for whatever icon you place within it.

props.name: icon
props.doc: Defines the [primary icon](/icons/primary) to be used, as a string.

props.name: title
props.doc: Use a title to provide extra information about the icon used.

props.name: border
props.doc: use `true` to display a rounded border with an inherited color. Keep in mind that the icon will have a larger total width and height of `+0.5em`.

props.name: alt
props.doc: the alternative label (text version) of the icon. Defaults to the imported icon name.

props.name: size
props.doc: the dimension of the icon. This will be the `viewBox` and represent `width` and `height`. Defaults to `16`. You can use `small`,`medium`, `large` or `auto`. Auto will enable that the icon size gets inherited by the parent HTML element if it provides a `font-size`.

props.name: color
props.doc: the color can be any valid color property, such as Hex, RGB or preferable â€“ any CSS variable from the [colors table](/uilib/usage/customisation/colors), e.g. `var(--color-ocean-green)`. Default is no color, which means `--color-black-80`.

props.name: inheritColor
props.doc: Defaults to `true`. Set to `false` if you do not want to inherit the color by `currentColor`.

props.name: modifier
props.doc: modifier class to define. Will result in: `dnb-icon--${modifier}`.

props.name: skeleton
props.doc: If set to `true`, an overlaying skeleton with animation will be shown.
